ActCanadian Race Relations Foundation Act
PrecisReappointment of RUBIN FRIEDMAN of Ottawa, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, on a part-time basis.
